ygData.msgSnippet: We pay monthly for them to keep the servers up if we did not pay we could not play. the don t call it pay to play for nothing). And this is the internet so of

We pay monthly for them to keep the servers up if we did not pay we could
not play. the don't call it pay to play for nothing). And this is the
internet so of course stuff is goona mess up. oh and Downtime starting at
7am tomorrow for 6 hours. Reic Morrel-Thule server
